Review Text:

Name: IJssalon Tofani

Name: IJssalon Tofani

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Family owned. Family run. History runs deep here. I went waffel on waffel with the ice cream and waffel. OutSTANDING. WORLD class. Please do not stroll in the Red Light District and miss this place.

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Excellent quality ice cream shop that has been going since 1942. Better try this one in favor of the tourist trap Nutella and wafel shops further on the Nieuwmarkt. I had an espresso with a scoop of pistache cream ‚òïüç®üëåüèª

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Not special, staff is friendly but ice cream is not tasty

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Terrace is very nice, watch the many go by. The service is simple and good, just like the icecream, coffees, panini and some sweets. The ice cream is made with too much sugar, which to me is a real treat. Every year there are new ‚Ä¶

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Good ice-cream we go back again tomorrow!

Review Text:

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Great gelato. Even on a rainy day.

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Delicious italian ice cream. Bit pricey but worth it. Portions are a little small but enough. Not a huge amount of choice but they do have all the authetic flavors and even a stroopwafel flavor (dutch syrup cookie). They have vegan options ‚Ä¶

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Ice cream was good (4/5), canola was not good (2/5), and service was terrible. The proprietor refused to accept my card even though the card machine was on the counter. Not impressed.

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Best Italian ice cream in Amsterdam so far. The "nocciola" (hazelnut) is pretty good and the chocolate as well of pistacchio. In cone or cup, depending on you, but the cup would be better for the full taste. The cone is better for the environment, no trash. The choice is yours

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: It's been there for as long as I can remember. Its beauty to me is its authenticity and complete lack of pretention. Just a few old monochromes of Italy, printed large. And that's really all you need if you have really, really, really good ice-cream.

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Vero gelato italiano. One of the really few places where to find a real gelato. A bit pricy (3‚Ç¨ for a 2 scoops) but in line with Amsterdam price and definitely worth if you crave for gelato. Tried pistacchio and spicy dark chocolate: recommended!

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: Hidden in plain sight!  You would never know it when walking by but this place is a fantastic ice cream shop which makes authentic gelato. An oasis in an area that is otherwise full of tourist traps! Buonissimo!

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text:

Name: IJssalon Tofani
Review Text: It's one my top ice-cream parlours in the city. Don't let the old fashioned interior keep you away from this real Italian gelato. Pistachio and hazelnut are my favourites. Just authentic and real gelato!
